name: Can I Get An Amen - Bendy And The Ink Machine
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Intro]
[ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch]
[ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch]


[Verse 1]
[ch]Am[/ch]                  [ch]E[/ch]
He comes out of the shadows
[ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]E[/ch]
To offer me his blessings
[ch]Am[/ch]                [ch]E[/ch]
Emerging from the darkness
[ch]E[/ch]                   [ch]Am[/ch]
I pray you hear me, Bendy

[ch]Am[/ch]                    [ch]E[/ch]
I hope you've come to save me
[ch]Am[/ch]                  [ch]E[/ch]
From this corrupted body
[ch]Am[/ch]                   [ch]E[/ch]
I've done so much to please you
[ch]E[/ch]                      [ch]Am[/ch]
Please do the same for me



[Pre-Chorus]
[ch]Dm[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]
I am your disciple
[ch]Dm[/ch]
You know that's true
[ch]Am[/ch]      [ch]E[/ch]
Look at everything
[ch]Am[/ch]
I've done for you
[ch]Dm[/ch]
You're here and there
[ch]Dm[/ch]
And everywhere
[ch]E[/ch]
My love and sacrifice I've shared


[Chorus]
N.C.         [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]E[/ch]
Can I get an amen
[ch]E[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch]
Amen
[ch]E[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]
Can I get an amen
[ch]E[/ch]     [ch]Am[/ch]
Oh oh amen


[Verse 2]
[ch]Am[/ch]                     [ch]E[/ch]
These pipes, they flow together
[ch]Am[/ch]                [ch]E[/ch]
These pipes, they flow... Forever and ever!
[ch]Am[/ch]                     [ch]E[/ch]
The cogs and gears are turning
[ch]E[/ch]                          [ch]Am[/ch]
So that you may live here, Bendy

[ch]Am[/ch]                       [ch]E[/ch]
The plans of this "silly vision"
[ch]Am[/ch]             [ch]E[/ch]
Have come into fruition
[ch]Am[/ch]                          [ch]E[/ch]
But you've written your own story...
[ch]E[/ch]                               [ch]Am[/ch]
And it's like nothing I've ever seen!


[Pre-Chorus]
[ch]Dm[/ch]                [ch]Am[/ch]            [ch]Dm[/ch]
I've orchestrated music for the episodes
[ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]E[/ch]              [ch]Am[/ch]
Of this sick and twisted little children's show
[ch]Dm[/ch]
And now I see you everywhere
[ch]E[/ch]
Sacrifice is all I've shared

[ch]E[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]
Can I get an amen


[Solo]
[ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch]
[ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch]
[ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch]
[ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]

[Bridge]
[ch]Am[/ch]
Quake in fear
[ch]Am[/ch]
For he is near
[ch]C[/ch]
Waiting for you to take a step in here
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If you run you cannot hide
[ch]E[/ch]
You're in danger the moment you arrive
[ch]Am[/ch]
Why not relax? C'mon have some soup
[ch]C[/ch]
It's probably gonna be the last thing you do
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If you really don't wanna die...
[ch]E[/ch]
KEEP ON RUNNING FOR YOUR LIFE.


[Pre-Chorus] (Open Chords)
[ch]Dm[/ch]
I am your disciple
[ch]Dm[/ch]
You know that's true
[ch]Am[/ch]
Look at everything
[ch]Am[/ch]
I've done for you
[ch]Dm[/ch]
You're here and there
[ch]Dm[/ch]
And everywhere
[ch]E[/ch]
My love is all i've shared
N.C.         [ch]Am[/ch]
Can I get an amen


[Outro]
 [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]E[/ch]
(Amen, amen, m-m-mh)
 [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]E[/ch]
(Amen, amen, m-m-mh)
 [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]E[/ch]
(Amen, amen, m-m-mh)
 [ch]E[/ch]
(Amen, amen, m-m-mh)

[ch]Am[/ch]   [ch]E[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch]
Amen

[ch]Am[/ch]   [ch]E[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch]
Amen

[ch]E[/ch]                 [ch]Am[/ch]
Amen, Amen, Amen, Amen

[ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]
[ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]
[ch]Am[/ch] [ch]E[/ch]
[ch]E[/ch]             [ch]Am[/ch]
Can I get an amen

name: Fish Out Of Water - The Amazing World Of Gumball
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Verse 1]
            [ch]C[/ch]                   [ch]Em[/ch]
This little world we live in
        [ch]Am[/ch]
It's so amazing
          [ch]C[/ch]                     [ch]Em[/ch]
You're my fully fledged friend
        [ch]Am[/ch]
So many memories

         [ch]C[/ch]                      [ch]Em[/ch]
They all think that we're crazy
      [ch]Am[/ch]
I absolutely agree
              [ch]C[/ch]                 [ch]Em[/ch]
At least it's got us somewhere
               [ch]Am[/ch]
Somewhere that I want to be


[Pre-Chorus 1]
        [ch]G[/ch]
All the things that we've been through together
[ch]Am[/ch]
What the what!?
    [ch]F[/ch]
You think that changes anything
[ch]G[/ch]                       [ch]Am[/ch]
Am I just a fish out of water maybe not
[ch]F[/ch]
I've found my place where I can be king

[Chorus]
      [ch]C[/ch]
Carry on!
           [ch]Em[/ch]
It can get wild, it can get weird
   [ch]Am[/ch]
Oh no
                [ch]F[/ch]
That won't stop me!

     [ch]C[/ch]
Come on!
[ch]Em[/ch]
Stand right beside me
[ch]Am[/ch]
Don't leave my side, please
[ch]F[/ch]
Let's always be amazing


[Verse 2]
[ch]C[/ch]                               [ch]Em[/ch]
I'm on my way, on my way
              [ch]Am[/ch]
And where I'm going, who knows?
[ch]C[/ch]                               [ch]Em[/ch]
From the beginning to the end
            [ch]Am[/ch]
But I can't do it alone!


[Pre-Chrous 2]
      [ch]C[/ch]
We'll make the most of it
[ch]Em[/ch]
Enjoy it while were kids
      [ch]Am[/ch]
We'll do the most impossible things

[ch]C[/ch]
Sink or swim, thick or thin,
[ch]Em[/ch]
Do or die, lose or win,
[ch]Am[/ch]
Under your wing!


[Chorus]
[ch]C[/ch]
Carry on!
           [ch]Em[/ch]
It can get wild, it can get weird
   [ch]Am[/ch]
Oh no
                [ch]F[/ch]
That won't stop me

[ch]C[/ch]
Come on!
    [ch]Em[/ch]
Oh, stay right beside me
[ch]Am[/ch]
Don't leave my side, please
      [ch]F[/ch]
Let's always be amazing

[ch]C[/ch]                             [ch]Em[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!
[ch]Am[/ch]                            [ch]F[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!

[ch]C[/ch]                             [ch]Em[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!
[ch]Am[/ch]                            [ch]F[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!


[Bridge]
[ch]G[/ch]                       [ch]Am[/ch]
I'd like to be somebody smarter, but you
                [ch]F[/ch]                          [ch]Am[/ch]
Know what? That doesn't change anything
[ch]G[/ch]                       [ch]Am[/ch]
Am I just a fish out of water? No I'm not!
[ch]F[/ch]
I am the king!


Oh
[ch]C[/ch]
On
           [ch]Em[/ch]
It can get wild, it can get weird
   [ch]Am[/ch]
Oh no
                [ch]F[/ch]
That won't stop me!

[ch]C[/ch]
Gumball
[ch]Em[/ch]
Stay right beside me
[ch]Am[/ch]
Don't leave my side, please
      [ch]F[/ch]
Let's always be amazing!

[ch]C[/ch]                             [ch]Em[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!
[ch]Am[/ch]                            [ch]F[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!

[ch]C[/ch]                             [ch]Em[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!
[ch]Am[/ch]                            [ch]F[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!


[ch]C[/ch]                             [ch]Em[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!
[ch]Am[/ch]                            [ch]F[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!

[ch]C[/ch]                             [ch]Em[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!
[ch]Am[/ch]                            [ch]F[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!


[ch]C[/ch]                             [ch]Em[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!
[ch]Am[/ch]                            [ch]F[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!

[ch]C[/ch]                             [ch]Em[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!
[ch]Am[/ch]                            [ch]F[/ch]
I'm on my way! I'm on my way! I'm on my way!


[Outro]
            [ch]C[/ch]                     [ch]Em[/ch]
This little world we live in
          [ch]Am[/ch]
It's been amazing
[ch]F[/ch]                                 [ch]C[/ch]
It's been amazing

name: Take It
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Intro]
[ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]
[ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]
[ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]
[ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]


[Verse 1]
[ch]Bb[/ch]            [ch]Gm[/ch]
When you go, when you stay,
[ch]Am[/ch]                                            [ch]Dm[/ch]
When will you figure out what you're gonna do anyway?
[ch]Bb[/ch]                                 [ch]Gm[/ch]
I have a life to live, and I ain't gonna live it at all,
[ch]Am[/ch]                      [ch]Dm[/ch]
If you're gonna stick around

[ch]Bb[/ch]           [ch]Gm[/ch]
I will fall, let it go,
[ch]Am[/ch]                          [ch]Dm[/ch]
'Cause you can't do nothing on your own
[ch]Bb[/ch]
I'll take the chance
           [ch]Gm[/ch]
I'll walk away
   [ch]Am[/ch]                     [ch]Dm[/ch]
Not tomorrow, just today


[Chorus]
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If that's all it's gonna take, then I will take it
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If that's all I gotta do, then I will do it
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If that's all I gotta find, then I will
[ch]Gm[/ch]                  [ch]Bb[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]Dm[/ch]
Search for a better love, all on my own


[Instrumental]
[ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]
[ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]


[Verse 2]
[ch]Bb[/ch]           [ch]Gm[/ch]
When you go, when you stay
[ch]Am[/ch]                                   [ch]Dm[/ch]
Do you really know what you wanna do anyway?
[ch]Bb[/ch]                         [ch]Gm[/ch]
I've got things to do, and I can't do them
   [ch]Am[/ch]                   [ch]Dm[/ch]
If you're here to stay (you're here to stay)

[ch]Bb[/ch]                   [ch]Gm[/ch]
I will go, can't you see?
         [ch]Am[/ch]                  [ch]Dm[/ch]
That you can't do anything without me
              [ch]Bb[/ch]                 [ch]Gm[/ch]
I'll take the chance, I'll walk away
[ch]Am[/ch]                        [ch]Dm[/ch]
Not tomorrow, just today


[Chorus]
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If that's all it's gonna take, then I will take it
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If that's all I gotta do, then I will do it
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If that's all I gotta find, then I will
[ch]Gm[/ch]                     [ch]Bb[/ch]
Search for that better love
[ch]Am[/ch]           [ch]Dm[/ch]
That better love


[Chorus]
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If that's all it's gonna take, then I will take it
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If that's all I gotta do, then I will do it
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If that's all I gotta find, then I will
[ch]Gm[/ch]                     [ch]Bb[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]Dm[/ch]
Search for that better love, all on my own


[Instrumental]
[ch]Dm[/ch]  [ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]F[/ch] [ch]Bb[/ch]


[Bridge]
              [ch]Bb[/ch]                  [ch]Bb[/ch]
I'll take the chance, I'll find a way
[ch]Am[/ch]                        [ch]Dm[/ch]
Not tomorrow, just today


[Chorus]
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If that's all it's gonna take, then I will take it
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If that's all I gotta do, then I will do it
[ch]Dm[/ch]
If that's all I gotta find, then I will
[ch]Gm[/ch]                  [ch]Bb[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]Dm[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]Dm[/ch]
Search for a better love, all on my own


[Outro]
      [ch]Dm[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch]
On my own
[ch]Gm[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]Gm[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]
I will take it, I will take it
[ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]Dm[/ch]
On my own

G--320033
Am-577555
C--032010
D--000232
Em-779987
Bm-799777
Éstos son los acordes que usa Ictus,
pero no suenan mal los acordes comunes.

[ch]G[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]      -     [ch]Am[/ch]   [ch]Am[/ch]      --Intro (x2)

[ch]G[/ch]
Un pequeño grupo de suspiros locos
[ch]Am[/ch]                                      [ch]G[/ch]
ha tomado por asalto las trampitas del amor,
                     [ch]C[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]
Y ha alejado el tiempo, de los buenos tiempos
                          [ch]G[/ch]
del buen juicio y la razón,
                     [ch]C[/ch]
Y a darle todos juntos,
                  [ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]G[/ch]
juntos juntos todos buena cuerda al reloj,
                      [ch]C[/ch]
Y a darle todos juntos,
                  [ch]D[/ch]                     [ch]G[/ch]
juntos juntos todos buena cuerda al reloj.
[ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]Am[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
Un corazón suicida, que nace por ti, que lucha por mí,
                    [ch]Am[/ch]                    [ch]G[/ch]
va ocupando las calles con un grito de amor,
                 [ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]
un verso en la mano, la revolución.

[ch]Em[/ch]                 [ch]Am[/ch]                     [ch]Em[/ch]
Un corazón de salmón que nada cuesta arriba,
                   [ch]Am[/ch]                      [ch]Em[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch]
va contra corriente entre sordera y mentira.
[ch]Em[/ch]                 [ch]Am[/ch]                     [ch]Em[/ch]
No tengo más canción que mi voz que te admira
                   [ch]Am[/ch]             [ch]Bm[/ch]         [ch]Am[/ch]
y este puño que se alza con la ?V?  ?de la vida.

[ch]G[/ch]
Un pequeño grupo de suspiros locos
[ch]Am[/ch]                                         [ch]G[/ch]
ha tomado por asalto las trampitas del amor,
                  [ch]C[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]G[/ch]
Y ha robado la llave que mantiene encerrado el tiempo del reloj,
                     [ch]C[/ch]                    [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]G[/ch]
Que le detiene y le atrasa, le atrasa y detiene, manejando el amor.
                     [ch]C[/ch]                      [ch]D[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]
Que le detiene y le atrasa, le atrasa y detiene, manejando el amor.

[ch]Am[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
Un corazón suicida, que nace por ti, que muere por mí,
                     [ch]Am[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]
va inundando las calles con un gesto de amor,
                     [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
con un sueño en la mano, la revolución.

[ch]Em[/ch]                 [ch]Am[/ch]                     [ch]Em[/ch]
Un corazón de salmón que nada cuesta arriba,
                  [ch]Am[/ch]                      [ch]Em[/ch]     [ch]Am[/ch]
va contra corriente entre ceguera y mentira.
[ch]Em[/ch]                 [ch]Am[/ch]                     [ch]Em[/ch]
No tengo más canción que mi voz que te admira
                   [ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]Bm[/ch]         [ch]Am[/ch]
y este puño que se alza con la ?V?    ?de la vida.

[ch]G[/ch]
Un pequeño grupo de suspiros locos
[ch]Am[/ch]                                       [ch]G[/ch]
ha tomado por asalto las trampitas del amor,
                     [ch]C[/ch]
Y ha alejado el tiempo,
                   [ch]D[/ch]                          [ch]G[/ch]
de los buenos tiempos del buen juicio y la razón,
                   [ch]C[/ch]                      [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]G[/ch]
Y a darle todos juntos, juntos juntos todos buena cuerda al reloj. (x3)
                   [ch]C[/ch]                      [ch]D[/ch]
Y a darle todos juntos, juntos juntos todos?
                                        [ch]G[/ch]
pero todos juntos ?nueva cuerda al reloj.


Orgullosamente CCH oriente. (Ahí se inspiró esta rola)

Orgullosamente CCH oriente. (Ahí se inspiró esta rola)

Shanice part 2 by: CG Project

Intro: [ch]G[/ch], [ch]C9[/ch] 2X
I.[ch]G[/ch], [ch]C9[/ch] 
It's been years since I memories this song for you
At hanggang ngayon di pa nagbago
Di pa naluluma sa kanta ko
Nandun pa rin sa isip ko
Naalala ko na ang pangalan mo
Nandun  ang picture mo sa FB

Refrain: 
[ch]Em[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]  
Sa itsura mo mukha parin dalaga
[ch]Em[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]    pause…
Hanggang ngayon hindi parin kita type

Chorus 1:
   [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
Oh Shanice nabalitaan ko 
    [ch]Em[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]
May BF kana but i'm still be your friend
   [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
Oh Shanice maganda ka parin
[ch]Em[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch] Pause…
Hanggang ngayon Torpe na naman ako/na ako sayo
[ch]G[/ch] C92X

II.[ch]G[/ch], [ch]C9[/ch]
Pagnandidito ka... kasama mo mga ka-tropa mo
But I'm nervous 2 see u
Alam ko pag-nakita kita kasama mo BF mo
